headline: Show HN: My 5/3/1 App is now available on Android
description:
Hi HN!

For those of you that remember, I recently posted about my 5/3/1 app making about $500/mo on iOS and made it the front page [0] (still stoked about that).

I'm happy to say the app is now available on Android [1]! Please check it out and let me know what you think! I'm really curious to see how it performs vis-à-vis the iOS version.

[0] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31508009 [1] https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=dev.strongpige...
